original_text: At that hour Jesus said to the crowds, “Have you come out as against a robber, with swords and clubs to capture me? Day after day I sat in the temple teaching, and you did not seize me.
korean_text: 그 때에 예수께서 무리에게 말씀하시되 너희가 강도를 잡는 것 같이 칼과 몽치를 가지고 나를 잡으러 나왔느냐 내가 날마다 성전에 앉아 가르쳤으되 너희가 나를 잡지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: At that hour Jesus said to the crowds,
Have you come out as against a robber,
with swords and clubs to capture me?
sentences.korean_translation: 칼과 몽둥이를 가지고 나를 잡으러 왔느냐?

sentences.original_text: Day after day I sat in the temple teaching,
and you did not seize me.
